purpose: A reusable skeleton loading component that displays an animated placeholder while content is being loaded

functions.name: Skeleton
functions.core_logic: Renders a div element with pulse animation, rounded corners, and muted background color, allowing custom className and other HTML div attributes to be passed through

key_points: Simple skeleton UI component for loading states
Uses Tailwind CSS classes for styling and animation
Extends HTML div element attributes for flexibility

patterns: Component composition pattern with spread props
TypeScript for type safety with React.HTMLAttributes
cn() utility for conditional/merged className handling
issues: No default export which some developers might expect
Depends on external cn utility function which must be maintained
No accessibility attributes (aria-label, role) to indicate loading state
Could benefit from additional props like 'width', 'height', or 'variant' for more customization options
